Name: Cherry Island
About the game: Fighting in a world of trouble. The officer Willow is working for the Nations Defensive Alliance (NDA) to protect the islands of Cherry near from the Caribbean sea. The threat ? A war engineering society invading the earth for bad reasons: the Z Corporation From a first person shooter to a simulation view, including jets, boats or armored vehcules, that 3d game give you intense solo action. Feel the opportunity to experiment a life of danger, from solo war gameplay to various arcade simulations and situations. Additional content will be added to this product over the months. Details Dozens of controlable vehicles (attack jet, yachts, war cargo, civilian vehicles). Enter the battle of two bots factions where you will make the difference for your side. Custom missions gives you direct access to various actions that you can find during the history mod. Next release This game is in bÃªta stage, contributions for the performance of the software are planned. Purchasing current version gives you access to new missions update package called Act II : Z Corporation part (To be released in 2023)
